option.name: originalContent
option.value: { "name": "backend", "version": "1.0.0", "description": "", "main": "index.js", "scripts": { "test:all": "npm test && npm run test:int", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest", "test:int": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=:memory: jest tests/games.integration.test.js", "start": "node server.js", "dev": "nodemon server.js", "seed:games": "node backend/config/seedGames.js", "coverage": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --coverage --runInBand", "coverage:all": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=:memory: jest --coverage --runInBand", "coverage:int": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=:memory: jest tests/games.integration.test.js --coverage --runInBand" }, "keywords": [], "author": "", "license": "ISC", "type": "module", "dependencies": { "bcrypt": "^6.0.0", "bcryptjs": "^3.0.3", "cors": "^2.8.5", "dotenv": "^17.2.3", "express": "^5.1.0", "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2", "mariadb": "^3.4.5", "sequelize": "^6.37.7", "swagger-ui-express": "^5.0.1", "yaml": "^2.8.2" }, "devDependencies": { "cross-env": "^7.0.3", "jest": "^29.7.0", "nodemon": "^3.1.10", "supertest": "^6.3.4" }, "jest": { "testEnvironment": "node", "testMatch": [ "**/backend/tests/**/*.test.js" ], "collectCoverageFrom": [ "routes/**/*.js", "models/**/*.js", "middleware/**/*.js", "app.js", "!server.js", "!tests/**", "!config/**" ], "coverageDirectory": "coverage", "coverageReporters": [ "text", "text-summary", "html" ] } }
